GSD.description:
ext4: make sure ext4_append() always allocates new block

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.19.256 by commit 4816177c9f154594c8a841ed95b883eb07e4d6ce. For more details please see the references link.
